DOC.brief_summary: KorAHF is a multi-center registry (prospective cohort) for acute decompensated heart failure patients in Korea. The aim of this registry is to analyze several causes affecting prognosis and survival and to develop new strategies for managing acute decompensated heart failure.
DOC.brief_title: Registry (Prospective Cohort) for Heart Failure in Korea (KorAHF)
DOC.criteria: All consecutive hospitalized adult patients who have 1 and (2 and/or 3) 1. Symptom and/or sign of heart failure 2. Lung congestion 3. Objective finding of LV systolic dysfunction (LVEF), or structural heart disease N.C.
